mods.abstract: Performance of Cincinnati Rag, written by Dave Franklin, published by Morris Edwin H & Co. Inc., produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, arranged by Ray Edenton, released in February 1966, and performed by Ray Edenton (guitar), Boots Randolph (sax), Charlie McCoy (harmonica), Grady Martin and Harold Bradley (guitar), Floyd Cramer (piano), Buddy Harman (drums), Bob Moore and Joe Zinkan (bass).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
